          <title>
            <string language="en">Pavlov's experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment Pavlovs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expérience de Pavlov</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência de Pavlov</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento del Pavlov</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα Pavlov</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de Pavlov</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set up to study the response to stimuli of the salivary glands of dogs.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">classical conditioning</string>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einer experimentellen 
Studie des Sets bis die Antwort zu den Auslöseimpulsen der Speichel- 
Drüsen der Hunde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une installation 
expérimentale étudiait la réponse aux stimulus des glandes 
salivaires des chiens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um estudo experimental
do jogo até a resposta aos stimuli das glândulas salivary dos cães.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per studiare la risposta agli stimoli delle ghiandole 
salivarie dei cani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική ίδρυση για να
μελετήσει την απάντηση στα ερεθίσματα των σιελογόνων αδένων των 
σκυλιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a estudio experimental 
del conjunto hasta la respuesta a los estímulos de las glándulas 
salivales de perros.</string>
          </description>
